scripts.build: git checkout site && git reset --hard 678fc3c && git checkout master . && npx snowpack build && find build/* -maxdepth 0 ! -name 'index.html' ! -name 'src' -exec rm -r {} + && mv build docs && find . -maxdepth 1 ! -name '.' ! -name 'docs' ! -name '.git' ! -name '.gitignore' ! -name 'node_modules' -exec rm -r {} + && touch docs/.nojekyll && echo 'recomputer.io' > docs/CNAME && perl -pi -w -e 's&<!--stats-->&<script defer src='"'"'https://static.cloudflareinsights.com/beacon.min.js'"'"' data-cf-beacon='"'"'{"token": "12bd2d32f99242b4b67d66a9d48cb0f1"}'"'"'></script>&' docs/index.html && git add . && git commit -m 'Built'
